Uses of Class
edu.uweo.java2.assignment9.AbstractCommand

  • Packages that use AbstractCommand 
    Package Description
    edu.uweo.java2.assignment9  
    edu.uweo.java2.assignment9.client  

    • Uses of AbstractCommand in edu.uweo.java2.assignment9

      Subclasses of AbstractCommand in edu.uweo.java2.assignment9 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddCommand
      A subclass of AbstractCommand in which an attached Receiver adds operand1 to operand2, and result is then set from the result of the computation
      class  DivCommand
      A subclass of AbstractCommand in which an attached Receiver divides operand1 into to operand2, and result is then set from the result of the computation
      class  MulCommand
      A subclass of AbstractCommand in which an attached Receiver multiplies operand1 by operand2, and result is then set from the result of the computation
      class  NAKCommand
      If this class is invoked in it's attached Receiver's action method, it triggers a "NAK" String that the server returns to a client sending the command
      class  ShutdownCommand
      Encapsulates a shutdown command sent to a Server
      class  SubCommand
      A subclass of AbstractCommand in which an attached Receiver subtracts operand1 from operand2, and result is then set from the result of the computation

    • Uses of AbstractCommand in edu.uweo.java2.assignment9.client

      Methods in edu.uweo.java2.assignment9.client with parameters of type AbstractCommand 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String Client.execute(AbstractCommand command)
      Forwards a given command to the server for execution, by: Opening a connection to the server Instantiating a command object Passing the command object to the server via ObjectOutputStream Waits for an acknowledgement from the server Reads the acknowledgement as an InputStream Closes the connection
